channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: When you hear the name Pat Cipollone, think Patsy Baloney.
Pregnant Texas woman driving in HOV lane told police her unborn child counted as a passenger. https://t.co/BlUjLgdmLP
Wordle 385 5/6 ‚¨úüü®‚¨ú‚¨úüü® ‚¨ú‚¨ú‚¨úüü®‚¨ú ‚¨úüü®‚¨ú‚¨úüü® üü©üü®üü®üü®üü© üü©üü©üü©üü©üü©
What‚Äôs your favorite day for a crossword?
Leave No Trace on AppleTV is totally worth a watch. https://t.co/wlPuLNx8yP
Eric Clapton: ‚ÄúI Can't Do That. Nobody Ever Plays On the Beatles Records.‚Äù https://t.co/8SmsdqeJDH

Twitter should be acquired by a big infrastructure-rich tech company with a strong developer program. Twitter plus its API has great potential as a backbone, no one else has anything like it. The acquirer could be Microsoft, Amazon, Google.
Would anyone be a good CEO of Twitter? Or maybe a big infrastructure-rich tech company with a strong developer program will acquire the company. That could be Microsoft, Amazon or Google.
Musk ends bid to buy Twitter. https://t.co/LoyCBFPobL
@BeschlossDC It was expected.
Best pun of the day. Patsy Baloney, former White House Counsel for Trump.

This is why Musk got cold feet, and why Twitter is holding him to the deal. The short version, tech stocks tanked hard in April and haven't recovered. https://t.co/TT5wtHzwaJ
BTW when they say Musk is worth $250 billion or whatever, do they come up with that number by taking the number of shares he has and multiply by the price? If so that's a pretty bogus way to do it, because who knows what he's using those shares as collateral for.
@Techmeme Twitter tanking would be far worse than Google pulling the plug on Google Reader in 2013. The whole world is in a way built around Twitter, and it works pretty well.
Elon Musk officially tries to bail on buying Twitter. https://t.co/TBUHhV6HDx
Someone needs your lungs or they'll die. You're taken to a hospital where your bodies are connected. You are now breathing for two people. If you disconnect that's "abortion" and it's illegal.
Texas Legislators Threaten Sidley Over Abortion Care Travel Costs. https://t.co/kZ58F7xnRm
Larry Storch Dies: ‚ÄòF Troop‚Äô Actor Was 99. https://t.co/VCNrL8Y3vM

If voting is the big thing, then we ought to practice. Local marches to our polling places, before Election Day. A few times so we don't forget how to get there. BBQ, music, and of course voter registration. Make voting a social event. A joyous occasion.
@ElieNYC it's not a good bet.

twitter thinks one of my domains is a "malware url" -- but it's not -- until now it wasn't being used for anything other than a parked home page. i'm not finding anything online about this error... obviously it's in some database somewhere somehow.
Americans Are Losing Their Right to Not Conform. https://t.co/wrZd093FPU
The worst virus variant just arrived. The pandemic is not over. #nopaywall https://t.co/faOxm8h9MY

I think this is what you'll regret at 80. That you aren't 20.
And btw it's because sex is great at 20.
So if you're 20 you should do a lot of that.
At least it'll make you smile when you're 80 (I imagine).
And btw secretly I think the reason the Supreme Court passed that crazy abortion ruling is that they resent people who had good sex when they were younger.
Hey people of my age were all of us horribly repressed because we were raised by people who were raised by crazy people.
Of course today's young folk were raised by crazy people too, so I've never bought the idea that they're so much more evolved. üòÄ

I hope they're misquoting Bezos, given how journalism works, I'd bet they are. https://t.co/poq4tNvUHu
apparently he did say it.
@TommyBeer yes but some part of that is the other teams learned how to neutralize randle but haven't learned anything about topin.
